title: Facebook Messenger could ban mass forwarding of messages to tackle coronavirus hoaxes and rumours
description: Similar rules have already been imposed on WhatsApp
content:
Facebook could stop people forwarding messages to too many people in an attempt to stop the spread of misinformation about coronavirus.
